analysis.Summary: Vue component that renders a newsletter subscription section with a localized title, subtitle, and a large email input field (FieldBig). It handles user input and submits the email address to the backend.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a UI section on the landing page for users to subscribe to the newsletter by entering their email and sending it via the applications store.

Components.name: FieldBig
Components.responsibilities: Displays a prominent input field with action button, handles input binding and emits action events.

Functions.name: sendApplication
Functions.description: Triggered when the user clicks the action button. Sends a Google Analytics event, constructs a newsletter subscription payload, calls the applications store to create a new application, handles success by resolving the response data, and handles errors by logging and setting a global error.
Functions.returns: Promise resolving the created application response data or rejecting with an error

analysis.Usage:
Imported and used as a landing page section component. Parent components pass a `content` prop for localization messages and optional `options` prop. It is typically imported as:

import SubscribeNewsletter from 'modules/landing/components/sections/SubscribeNewsletter.vue';
Notes: Email validation logic is present but commented out, indicating future enhancement or validation strategy change.
Uses `gtag` to emit an analytics event for newsletter subscription conversions.
Empty `<style>` block suggests styling is handled globally or inherited from parent styles.
